message.body: I want to see you sometime, I'm just not sure exactly when!!
I saved you some ice cream.I'm also cooking a chicken right now. It's my new hobby. Give me a time when you're free and I'll try to be free too!xxxx
Aw. Are you free tomorrow between 4:40 and limbs? I have a 2.5 lb chicken from the coop we could roast!
Hey mon fau, I'm on campus until five, but I could come home, grab limbs stuff, and meet for less-time-consuming-than-chicken-event at like five thirty?xx

Hi LF, the chicken needs to get cooked. It says on the recipe it will only take one hour. I have some squash soup I could feed you while the chicken roasts? Maybe tomorrow is too tight. Think it over and let me know.
Im sorry our schedules are so opposite. Weds morning 9:00 yoga date is too early for you right?
Actually, I have to be on campus at nine am m,w,f these days. We could do tomorrow and if the chicken doesn't cook in time that's ok?
That sounds good. I will see you tomorrow!
Later is good! What time are you thinking? I'm having a hard time leaving work! So much to do!!
Oh great! When suits? Is seven too late? Be honest!

Cancel everything, apparently I am teaching tonight. Grr. I was going to learn the class in my lunch break, but didn't because I thought I wasn't teaching, so now I need to learn it-no time for chicken. I'm so sorry (and annoyed). Can we try again on anot
Aw! I'm mad too! Certainly yes. Tomorrow night 5-Angie's class I'm free but I think you have a study group?
Sure thing!
Yup, teach until six and reading group at seven. Boo.
Idea! When is limbs over? Want to come by then for a bit?
It's over at nine. I could swing by for a quick cup of tea, or is that too late?
Yes! Lets do it! I will save some carcass for you too!
One of the students is feeling dizzy so it's a slow exit, sorry.x
Oh no! That's ok. Stay as long as you need to.
xxxxxxxxx.
